metadata.synopsis: Emperor AD if players agree to go to House of Hope against their advice.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Get the grimmoire to go to House of Hope and go upstairs Devil's Fee. - Anchor: S_LOW_DevilsFee_RitualCicleScene_f193dbba-450b-41e5-90d3-7db09f7c9faf

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: I strongly suggest that you reconsider this course of action.

1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
1.text: Whatever you expect to gain from the hells is not worth the risk of travelling there uninvited.
